title: VERBATIM: Ryan confident he’ll hand gavel to ‘next Republican'
text:
VERBATIM: Ryan confident he’ll hand gavel to ‘next Republican' 11:02am EDT - 01:06 
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan announces he will serve his full term and retire in January, saying he is leaving 'this majority in good hands with what I believe is a very bright future.'   
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan announces he will serve his full term and retire in January, saying he is leaving 'this majority in good hands with what I believe is a very bright future.'  //reut.rs/2qp6lIs
